#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install pid-killall
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`pid-killall` |`usage: pid-killall [-signal] pid`

#### Examples
```bash
pid-killall <pid>
```

signal:
```
pid-killall -9 <pid>
```
